subject: Science
title: The Mars Rovers
description: A quick win: understand The Mars Rovers.

hook.text: Spirit was designed to last 90 days on Mars. It kept going for over six years.

buildup.text: Its twin Opportunity lasted even longer â€” 15 years of driving across Mars.

discovery.text: They found minerals that only form in water, proving Mars once had lakes.

twist.text: Opportunity's final message translated roughly to 'My battery is low and it's getting dark.'

climax.text: Perseverance landed in 2021 and is now collecting rock samples for return to Earth.

punchline.text: A 90-day robot worked for six years. Engineers build for hope.

quiz.question: What did the Mars rovers discover that proved Mars once had water?
